name: C
title: C programming Bootcamp: From Beginner to Advanced
short_description: C programming is the mother of other programming languages. If you able to learn it, then you can learn other programming languages very easily

tutor.name: Mr. Kazi Abdul Aziz
tutor.info: Welcome, I am Mr. Kazi Abdul Aziz. I have been teaching students more than 12 years. I love to teach people. So, I hope you are ready for increasing your programming knowledge

requirements: A computer with Windows, Linux or Mac
contents.description: Welcome to this course. This course is designed for the beginners. After completing this course, you can solve basic problems by using C programming language.It doesn't matter if you are an absolute beginner or come from technologies like python or javascript.C is the key to developing performance-critical solutions, and this course is the key to exploring every detail of this programming language.Together we will walk the path that will make you a pro in a language that is the foundation of modern computer science.

Course_content: Why React instead of using only JavaScript?
contents.description: Welcome to this course. This course is designed for the beginners who wants to learn react. After completing this course, you can build amazing single page applications.It doesn't matter if you are an absolute beginner or come from technologies like python or C.It was completely updated and re-recorded from the ground up - it teaches the very latest version of React with all the core, modern features you need to know.Together we will walk the path that will make you a pro in a language.
